dublin_core.dcvalue: There s a new and emerging picture of telemedicine developing a technology that can now not only read a patient s blood pressure from a remote location but gives nurse case managers the ability to assess surgical wounds and lung capacity for asthma patients A device that operates on a single telephone line is making a big difference for patients and may become a valuable adjunct to disease management programs
Managing pregnancies, neonates, pediatric asthma, and CHF with the touch of a telephone.
